message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
